name: RayCastle
description:
A "BFG Team" game for  GameLoop Jam 0

BFG Team:

- Fabrizio "z4g0" Zagaglia

- Luca "Morgoth90" Salmin

- Michele "Post" Postpischl

Controls:

[WASD]: Move/Turn

[SPACE/CTRL]: Use weapon

[ARROWS]: Solve puzzles

[1-2]: Select weapons

Summary:

Move the map chunks to find a way to reach the "Skull of rock" and other lost treasures hidden in the most secret Raycastle's chamber.
Then, you'll have to find a way back and bring with you the loot using the rails on the floor.

Notes:

The game is based on raycasting technique and made in two weeks and in spare time.

The textures and sprites are from this tileset:  https://kenney.nl/assets/bit-pack

Have fun :D!
